name: CreateCourageWeeklyAffirmationsForFamilies
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Many of us these days have a voice enabled speaker. 

I bet for most, her name is Alexa. 

She is there to tell us when a package has arrived or when your tiny tots wanna hear their favorite song for the 87th time. 
Or maybe, just maybe, yours makes fart noises or tells a joke. 

But what if we could have something uplifting, encouraging, and special? What if we could give our family a mindset shift? 
Something that was light and happy and had our hearts feeling loved and supported. 

That’s what Create Courage is. 

It’s an Alexa skill that you can subscribe too in order to assist you and your family with affirmations, mindset shifts, as well as 
open the door to conversations that curate ways of positive thinking. 

What we start now becomes a habit. So let’s make positive thinking, believing in you and themselves, feeling happy, and improving well being the foundation and habit they hold tight to. 

We hope you enjoy this as much as we do. 

From our family to yours. 

Listen to weekly affirmations and journal prompts. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing", or "Alexa, Open Create Courage". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
